body_html: Also, I think we should do sth with bernoulli_ because it's very ambiguous (perhaps remove?). Right now it fills the tensor with samples from Bernoulli(0.5), but it could also mean a bernoulli with probabilities takes form tensor elements (which seems like what it should really do).
body_text: Also, I think we should do sth with bernoulli_ because it's very ambiguous (perhaps remove?). Right now it fills the tensor with samples from Bernoulli(0.5), but it could also mean a bernoulli with probabilities takes form tensor elements (which seems like what it should really do).
body: Also, I think we should do sth with `bernoulli_` because it's very ambiguous (perhaps remove?). Right now it fills the tensor with samples from Bernoulli(0.5), but it could also mean a bernoulli with probabilities takes form tensor elements (which seems like what it should really do).
